properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 4:20AM CST until January 12 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Periods of Wintry Precipitation Today and Accumulating Snow
Late this Afternoon and this Evening...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation in the northern part of the county
early this afternoon slowly spreading across the rest of the
county this afternoon. This will transition to snow, possibly
briefly heavy, during the late afternoon into early evening. Ice
accumulation up to one tenth of an inch is possible with snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches across northern parts of the
county. Winds will also gust to 40 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Will County.

* WHEN...From 12 PM today to 3 AM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY
